item.title: Test Post
item.description: Test post This is a test post, based on a default markdown document in Rstudio. This post has been written to test out some of the features we’re looking to use. item.title: Classroom Analytics
item.description: Analytics for face-to-face and hybrid courses For courses that are taught in the traditional face-to-face manner it can sometimes be trickly to collect enough data for a proper analysis. \(\chi^\color{red}2\)’s Classroom Analytics bridges the gap between online and face-to-face, and provides an important suplement to hybrid courses.

item.title: test_page
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.
